data.title: Fixed Session.Deserialize exceptions not throwing properly
data.body: as described in #6168 we don't get enough data to fix the crash, because the crash itself crashed. This makes everything go through Program.FatalError for complete logs and end user instructions what to do.

data.title: Investigate if SharpFont methods can replace several hacks
data.body: Font rendering is expensive. We currently draw font with black borders by rendering it twice with an offset. Maybe SharpFont/FreeType2 expose these things in a better and more efficient way. With the move from Tao.FreeType to SharpFont https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/2475 we gained access to the full API. https://github.com/Robmaister/SharpFont#cross-platform-freetype-bindings-for-net

data.title: AI has trouble managing helicopters with LimitedAmmo
data.body:
They will land and take off immediately especially when the bot's base is under attack so they effectively don't rearm and loop through half of their takeoff and landing activities.
## <bountysource-plugin>

Want to back this issue? **[Post a bounty on it!](https://www.bountysource.com/issues/4003714-ai-has-trouble-managing-helicopters-with-limitedammo?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github)** We accept bounties via [Bountysource](https://www.bountysource.com/?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github).
</bountysource-plugin>

data.title: D2k - 3 Ornithopter
data.body: I did not try it. I'm at internet cafe now. But it should increase number of Ornithopters.

data.title: Riflemen dead body animation is corrupted
data.body: Not sure when this regression was introduced. It plays very slowly and is overlayed with an alive version of the soldier which is confusing.

data.title: Fixed bogus warning as error CS0067 The event is never used
data.body: as this breaks `make all` on Mac and Linux on the latest @mono version. See #6101

data.title: No access on full statistic during End-game score screen
data.body:
i would like to check my economy , apm ... 
all i can do is , click "leave" ...

data.title: End-game score screen conflicts with ingame menu
data.body:
Repro case:
- Deploy and then sell conyard.
- Open the menu during the short delay between loss and the score screen showing.

data.title: Fix shroud hash updating.
data.body: Fixes #6308.

data.title: Don’t leak information about hidden actors.
data.body: Fixes #6125.

data.title: Shroud rendering is not updated after shroud is reset
data.body: The viewport must be moved first.  Regression from #5851(?)

data.title: Set the package version in the OS X .app
data.body: This allows the OS to distinguish between different releases.

data.title: Add creeps to scripted missions
data.body: Fixes #6298

data.title: Don’t clear shroud outside the map.
data.body: Fixes #6097.

data.title: Don’t display LaserZap if source and dest are hidden.
data.body:
Closes #6146.

Later, once we have code to find the intersection of a lines and cells (also needed for other fixes), we will be able to check all the cells along the path and only draw the parts of the beam that are actually visible.

data.title: Fixed invulnerable infantry
data.body: Closes #6263

data.title: Tiberian Sun visual fixes.
data.body:
Fix GAPILE spawn offset, add RP.
Fix NAWEAP/GAWEAP sequence offset and footprint/dimensions.
Fix Titan Tooltip name.
Fix Wolverine bounds.

Did more stuff..

Offset numbers are trial and error, please correct if you can get them to look better.

WIll do more wrt warf 2+ sprites overlapping later.

data.title: Disable fontconfig in packaged OSX build.
data.body: Works around https://bugzilla.xamarin.com/show_bug.cgi?id=16517 by forcing mono to use a dummy fontconfig configuration where there is nothing to cache.  Fixes #4785.

data.title: Allow giving MCV to allies with 10k of money?
data.body:
I think this would be nice in team games.

So if your ally loses base, you can buy him one with 10k or something like that.

This would be just new feature, and it would allow you to define how much some unit will cost if you give to ally. Not sure yet how it would work exactly, maybe by using engineers to capture it or something...

data.title: Tiberian Dawn crash midway though 'destroy the SAMs' mission
data.body:
So I was doing some of the basic missions trying to improve my skills in the campaign. The game was just starting to look up when the game went and crashed. I followed the instructions and got to the log. here is the contents:

Tiberian Dawn Mod at Version release-20140722
Operating System: Windows (Microsoft Windows NT 6.1.7601 Service Pack 1)
Runtime Version: .NET CLR 4.0.30319.18444
Exception of type `System.InvalidOperationException`: Sequence contains no matching element
   at System.Linq.Enumerable.First[TSource](IEnumerable`1 source, Func`2 predicate)
   at OpenRA.Mods.Cnc.SpawnViceroid.<Killed>c__AnonStorey6.<>m__A(World w)
   at OpenRA.World.Tick()
   at OpenRA.Game.TickInner(OrderManager orderManager)
   at OpenRA.Game.Tick(OrderManager orderManager)
   at OpenRA.Game.Run()
   at OpenRA.Program.Run(String[] args)
   at OpenRA.Program.Main(String[] args)

I did check the replay and it also crashed at the same point. Any assistance would be lovely.

data.title: Red Alert problems release 07-22-2014
data.body:
Here are a list of problems I have found in the Red Alert mod

Mines/Minelayers
- Soviet minelayer has too less ammo
-  Your own infantry and vehicles will trip on your mines
- Infantry can be killed by Anti vehicle mines
- The AP mines has too much health you cannot use a minigunner to fire on the floor to find them.

Aircraft problems
- Airfield Aircraft does not start landed on airfield
- Airplane build is not restricted when airfields are full
- Airfield is not limited to one aircraft
- Airfield planes do not return to airfield  automatically when out of ammo
- MIG has too much ammo
- Yak payload does not spread when firing (Usually it spreads 4 squares straight)
- Yak turning radius too large
- Tanya C4 does not flash on vehicles when placed. 
- Hind cannot be built because helipad is missing for soviets
- Allies can build hind

Superweapons
- A-bomb launch detected is not announced
- Reinforcement have arrived is not announced when paradrop is used
- Parabombs are missing for soviets
- You can aim paradrop in the water and it will drop nothing.
- Chronosphere is temporary teleports not permanent
- If infantry is inside an vehicle when chronoshift the infantry disappears.
- No chronostorm when chronosphere is overused.

Vehicle glitches
- Harvester can get stuck unloading at refinery (Both AI and player)
- squish command missing (usually hold down ALT and a red cursor appears)
- Stop noise (beeping) missing when pressing s
- If  a vehicle force fires on the floor and you move it into the area where it is force firing it can hurt itself and also kill itself.
- Turrets of heavy tanks face what they last fire at and do not reset to the front of the vehicle

Infantry
- Grenader warhead is the C&C 95 type not RA one with the fire
- Engineers do not work (for soviets at least)
- When the infantry wave they leave their hand up too long (animation rotation)
- Dogs can jump over concrete when attacking (they should only be able to jump barbed wire)
- Infantry do not duck when fired upon
- Medic heal does not make infantry glow
- When spy infiltrates refinery it should announce credits stolen
- Tanya does not laugh when she exits vehicle

Buildings
- Service depot animation too fast
- Power off does not work on most buildings
- Silos Needed is repeated too often 
- Medic, spy, engineer, and mechanic does nothing inside camo pillbox should be default
- Superweapon building animations missing (ie opening of missile silo)

data.title: Fixes year numbers in license text in file headers.
FMVs for expansion missions from C&C Red Alert
data.body:
In the Playstation Version of the expansion Red Alert: Retaliation FMV were added to the missions. These FMVs were not included in the expansions Aftermath and Counterstrike but were added in a patch for The first Decade.

Red Alert Retaliation Allies FMVs
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rBGLtn15h9Q

Red Alert Retaliation Soviet FMVs
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=diJFBZk9uFY

Ant missions
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R6SFNzfWdc4

Will these be included in OpenRA?

data.title: Mad Tank rifleman spawn bug/cheat
data.body:
Somehow this one guy makes it spawn riflemen.

Here is roughly what i see:
- Start Mad Tanks.
- Chrono them after 1 second.
- See spammage of riflemen at the place where you teleported.

The problem is that when this cheat is used, the game starts to lag like hell because of so many units spawning.

data.title: Implemented Units getting slower the more damaged they are
data.body:
Units now get slower the more damage they take.
Speed calculation is based on DamageState.

data.title: Cut off multiple instances of the interface voice.
data.body:
The voice that  goes "Construction complete!" "New Construction options" "Unit Ready" "Unit Lost"...

When clicking repeatedly on a build, whether to build, hold, or cancel multiple calls, the voice clouds up with multiple instances.

Polish to have it so each click command first cuts off any currently-playing instances of the voice to start the new call?

data.title: Changes Weapon.Impact() to use Target (from WPos).
data.body:
Requires #6265.

Split out from original overloaded PR #6162.

Improvement requested by @Phrohdoh, and allows calls to Weapon.Impact to specify a target, as opposed to just a position. Allowing much more flexible use of the Target parameter on the Warhead.DoImpact

data.title: chinook eject cargo with parachute whilst in air
data.body:
this idea exists in 2 different ways :
1. make cargo dropable per right-mouseclick on the chinook whilest in air
2. give cargo a %-chance (for each filled slot individual) to survive when chinook has 0 hp ... giving em the possibility to basicly "jump out of the chinook and open up a parachute"
   ![](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1997864/3983102/d38893e4-287c-11e4-8de1-bc229dd4bde8.png)

we could add both , or just one of these options

this will open up the way for interesting strategys without the fear of loosing the fragile chinook with 8-slot valuable cargo (the chinook itself for 900 is a good price , but still not just a peanut) 
soviets for example , have the option to "iron-cutain" a naval transporter ... sadly , we cant "iron curtain" planes ...

if there is any problem with the balance , we could still adjust chinooks HP , lower the %-chance to survive , nerf the number of seats , adjust chinooks price
## <bountysource-plugin>

Want to back this issue? **[Post a bounty on it!](https://www.bountysource.com/issues/3944038-chinook-eject-cargo-with-parachute-whilst-in-air?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github)** We accept bounties via [Bountysource](https://www.bountysource.com/?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github).
</bountysource-plugin>

data.title: Moves all utility commands to RA assembly.
data.body:
- Added IUtilityCommand allowing mods to add commands.
- Moved the --png command to the RA mod assembly.
- Maintaining backwards compatibility.
